short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ML-based Web3 analytics platform for finding and tracking the newest web3 projects super early discover.getmoni.io

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience Crypto Twitter(X) like never before with the Moni Discover Extension, your AI assistant for all things crypto. Learn more about accounts and projects, access their stats, and enhance your security directly on Twitter with just one click. You can check every account you want. 

> How to Use:
1️⃣ Click "Add to Chrome".
2️⃣ Go to twitter.com and refresh the page.
3️⃣ Start exploring Web3 projects effortlessly.

> Benefits of Moni Discover:
🔒 Security:
- Protection against scam accounts that impersonating original accounts and send phishing links, malicious replies and tweets.
 ⁃ Detection of suspicious activity when accounts change their name, handle and description.
- Check full history of the account changes. 

📊 Accounts Metrics and Stats:
- Monitor changes in followers/followings, mentions/smart mentions, growth rate and see which Smart Followers (VCs, DAOs, Influencers, Researchers, Alpha Hunters and Projects) are following the account.
- Study and analyze any X account to make informed decisions.

🔎 Accounts Tracking:
 ⁃ Add accounts to your watchlists to easily track their activity on Discord and Telegram.
 ⁃ Get notifications about new mentions from smart followers, bio changes, and new tweets.

Moni Discover makes using X more efficient and secure, which is crucial for both newcomers and professionals in the crypto space.


> Privacy:
We respect your privacy and do not track any of your activities within this extension. We only request access to Twitter to display Moni Discover content.

> Permissions Requested and Their Purposes:

– Read and change data on Twitter: 
This permission is essential for us to enhance X (Twitter) with Discover stats and to implement phishing and impersonation detection on Twitter. We request access to all sites to enable seamless integration of new sites when we add them.

– Read your browsing history: 
We need this permission to detect the current URL you are visiting, allowing us to mark scam/trusted tweets and accounts without page reloading and update the extension to alert you (we do not actually read your browsing history here).

– Read and write browser storage: 
We use storage to authorize your Discover account and save your extension’s configurations, such as theme, account, tier, etc.
